casebody.data:
In re R.L.C. No. 531A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 27, 2006. Constance Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for R.L.C. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Shannon Gilreath, for NCATL, et al. Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, for NTATL, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of October 2006 by NCATL and the American Civil Liberties Union of N.C. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of October 2006."
